summary: All three requirements (REQ-1, REQ-2, REQ-3) appear to be fully implemented in the diff. REQ-1 (infinite loading bug fix) is addressed with try-catch-finally blocks and error handling in UserManagementPage.tsx. REQ-2 and REQ-3 (searchable dropdowns for 'Pilih Client' and 'Pilih Asistenmu') are both implemented in ActivateServiceModal.tsx using Command/Popover components with search functionality. No missing requirements or hallucinated features detected.
